text: Jeon Kwang-hoon (, born 28 March 1956), also Jun Kwang-hoon, is a South Korean pastor and politician. He is the President of the Christian Council of Korea. He was also the former President of the Party of Practice of Christian Love. He also helped create the Christian Liberal Party. He is head pastor at in Seoul. He is known for his conservative political activism against the Moon Jae-in administration. Jeon was briefly an Independent candidate for President of South Korea in the 2025 snap presidential election. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Christian religious leaders Category:Politicians from Seoul Category:Political activists Category:Conspiracy theorists Category:South Korean activists
title: Jeon Kwang-hoon
